Text: Release from contractMichelle I hope you had a good Christmas I would appreciate if you could please let me know where you stand with the agreement to release both me and Enron from the obligations contained in my employment contract I have a firm offer for employment that is running out of time I would greatly appreciate your help in resolving this issue as soon as possible I look forward to receiving a draft of the agreement by email as per our understanding Thank you for your attention Regards Valter Stoiani Do You Yahoo Send your FREE holiday greetings online
